## SelfDescribingJson type

export interface for any Self-Describing JSON such as context or Self Describing events

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type SelfDescribingJson<T extends Record<keyof T, unknown> = Record<string, unknown>> = {
    schema: string;
    data: T;
};
```
